title: Tonight or Never
description: They called him "Lord of Sex." He was a rake, a rogue, a libertine and a scoundrel. With his wicked sense of humor, keen intelligence and charming ways, the Viscount Sexton was an expert in the art of seduction. But little did he know his days of debauchery were about to come to an end.For Chloe—determined little Chloe—intended to have him for her very own. She wanted him forever, and now she'd just have to get the stubborn devil to realize that they belonged together. And the feisty redhead had the perfect plan to do it. For what could be better than beating Don Juan at this own seductive game?
author: Dara Joy
